players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed, so the mafia is clearly active. We need to look for suspicious behavior in voting and discussion."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "Charlie's death suggests the mafia is active. I want to know if Diana had any motives or conflicts with Charlie."
You: "Can we vote on Diana and see what happens?"
Bob: "Diana is the mafia. I'm the detective and my investigation confirmed it. We must vote her out to win."
Diana: "I am the detective, I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Don't believe his lies about me."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

Alice: "Can we vote on Diana and see what happens?"
You: "Diana is the mafia. I'm the detective and my investigation confirmed it. We must vote her out to win."
Diana: "I am the detective, I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. Don't believe his lies about me."
